name: Totally Accurate Volleyball Simulator
description:
A 2D beach volleyball sports action game with local multiplayer. A race between 2 players to score the most points before the timer ends! 


Made by

goob - Game Design/Sound Design
Blirkit - Programming
JayCM99 - Programming/Trailer Editing
Elephantom - 2D Art
Boyyardee - 2D Art
